author: Lou Hoffman
comment: Redone face looks good on the LG G Watch R! The bottom is just a *bit* too dark, but do like the contrast. Just needs a few extras (battery icon, etc). Nicely done!

reply.author: SchmilK
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback!  Working on some added features right now.

title: Looks good on the G R!

author: Dan P
comment: Too tailored to the moto 360 and the flat tire. Lots of people have android wear that is not the 360. This face is incomplete.

reply.author: SchmilK
reply.content: Thanks for you feedback.  I have uploaded a new face that should be better for everyone who has fully inflated tires.  :)  Please let me know what you think.

title: No good on LG G Watch R
